title: Carter/Reese [Kiss Me] - Person of Interest
author: realproperaliens
comment: I will always ship them as Careese... this episode, I cried throughout the whole thing, bc Carter was in flashbacks and omg! the feels of Reese honoring her memory by taking an old case of hers. Tonight's epi brought me to this video.  #RIPCarter
What a beautiful video!! It shows the slow build up of feelings between them from their start to the end.
This coulda been a love story for the ages, then they killed her off?! I will never forgive the writers, I'm so disgusted! I'm still in shock!
The showrunners said that the kiss was unscripted. The actors just went there themselves. They thought it fit.
this is . . . perfect. no other words. other than, the hell were the writers thinking?!
description:
This has been my therapy since The Crossing aired. I've pretty much gone straight through John and Joss's story. So yeah, here is is!
